title: ALL SOLD - FS/FT - T202s - price drop 10/6
author: jayshum

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD - FS/FT - T202s - price drop 10/6
posts.post_content:
The following T202s are available. Prices include shipping with payment through PayPal G&S.  Discount available if buying multiple cards.  If interested or if you have any T202s or T205s to trade, PM me or email me at [url]jandcristi@verizon.net[/url].  If you want any more pictures, send me your email address and I will send them to you.

SOLD $70 - Dooin Gets His Man - Doolan/Dooin - small spot of paper loss near bottom left corner but otherwise a nice looking card

SOLD $30 - Lobert Almost Caught - Kling/Steinfeldt - decent looking card except for the tear at the bottom in the middle


SOLD $100 - Donlin Out At First - Gibson/Camnitz - nice card with no creases

SOLD $90 - The Athletic Infield - Thomas/Krause - faint wrinkle that you can feel and barely see in the middle of the card that goes about an inch down from the top

PM sent

John


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Bump with another price drop for the remaining 2 cards.  Offers also welcome.
